WorkItem.Description:
This expression crashes tsc Version 0.9.7.0

`(function foo () : foo { })`

```
$ tsc Foo.ts
/usr/local/share/npm/lib/node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc.js:45318
            if (typeNameSymbol.isTypeParameter()) {
                               ^
TypeError: Object Foo(): any has no method 'isTypeParameter'
    at PullTypeResolver.computeTypeNameExpression (/usr/local/share/npm/lib/node_modules/typescript/bin/tsc.js:45318:32)
[...]
```
WorkItem.Summary: Function declared to return a type with the same name crashes the compiler
